SwitchPreference.android:title: Pinch to Overview
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Pinch on the Homescreen to open the overview

SwitchPreference.android:title: Pulling down opens Notifications
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOn: Pulling down on the Homescreen will expand the statusbar.
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOff: When enabled pulling down on the Homescreen expand the statusbar.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Light StatusBar
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOn: The status bar may show dark icons when using a light wallpaper.
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOff: The status bar will always show light icons.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Save Scrolled State
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Saves the scroll position in the app tray

SwitchPreference.android:title: Home Button Opens App Drawer
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Pressing the home button while on the homescreen will open the app drawer

SwitchPreference.android:title: Show Hidden Apps
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOn: Hidden apps will be shown to change visibility settings
